puzzle.help: 1. Fill the board with a loop that passes through all tiles. 2. The path should make 90 degrees turns on the spots. 3. Between spots, the path makes one more 90 degrees turn. 4. So the path alternates turning on spots and outside them.

levels.level: O O O` O ` O O ` OO ` O O `
O O ` O ` O` O O ` O`
